ai-anya-e1009n1:0_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-anya-e1009n1:7_0: It should be seen as the root of the tree.
ai-anya-e1009n1:10_0: So you should cultivate the development of energy
ai-anya-e1009n1:12_0: Just as a strong person would protect
ai-anya-e1009n1:14_0: I also say that even a sensible person.
ai-anya-e1009n1:17_0: For the welfare of the truth,
ai-anya-e1009n1:18_0: for those deference to the teaching.
ai-anya-e1009n1:19_0: This principle is developed and cultivated;
ai-anya-e1009n1:21_0: There are things that entail rebirth,
ai-anya-e1009n1:22_0: The Buddha has declared their cause,
ai-anya-e1009n1:25_0: ‘May all be parted! May I not be all your possessions!’
ai-anya-e1009n1:27_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
